Paragraph: The best clinical effect was found with terbutaline .

1. Terbutaline

This is the only chemical entity mentioned in the paragraph. Terbutaline is a common bronchodilator medication used to prevent and treat bronchospasms (asthma attacks) and to prevent preterm labor. It is a beta-2 adrenergic receptor agonist.
